process.title: Start Your Journey With Us
process.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to become a Tareeqk driver partner
process.intro: To start your journey as a driver, you will need to download our Driver App and complete the signup process there. The app will guide you step by step to upload your personal details and required documents.
requirements: Active Mobile Number and Email Address
steps: Download the Driver App from the Google Play Store or Apple App Store.
Open the app and click on Sign Up.
Fill in your personal details: Name, Email, Password, and Phone Number.
Upload the required documents (Emirates ID, License, Mulkiah, etc.).
If you have a referral code, you can enter it during signup.
Submit your application and wait for approval.
process.note: Make sure all your documents are valid and clearly visible when uploading. Incomplete or incorrect applications may delay the approval process.
